top_repos.name: gecko_sdk
top_repos.description: The Gecko SDK (GSDK) combines our Series 0 and Series 1 IoT product software development kits (SDKs) based on Gecko Platform into a single, integrated SDK.

top_repos.name: simplicity_sdk
top_repos.description: The Simplicity Software Development Kit (SDK) is an embedded software development platform for building IoT products based on our Series 2 and upcoming Series 3 wireless and MCU devices.

top_repos.description: Start here to find code examples for Silicon Labs EFM32 and EFR32

top_repos.name: openthread
top_repos.description: OpenThread released by Nest is an open-source implementation of the Thread networking protocol

top_repos.name: SimplicityConnect-android
top_repos.description: This is the source code for the EFR Connect application for Android.
